description:
Warrior of the Chicken, Niwatori, may not have the power of the other warriors, but she does have the ability, "Eye of the Cormorant," that lets her see what the birds see. She has survived through battlefield after battlefield thanks to this, as well as her ability to betray others without any pangs of conscience. However, her philosophy is shaken when she meets the Monkey Warrior, Sharyu, for the first time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cutting a Chicken with a Beef Cleaver
Découper un poulet avec un hachoir pour bœuf
Gyuutou o Motte Niwatori o Saku
牛刀をもって鶏を裂く
